text: "Sweat It Out" is a 1993 song by Australian singer Jimmy Barnes and was released as the lead single from his sixth studio album Heat. It went to number 11 in Australia and number 30 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== ; CD Single (D11351) # "Sweat It Out" - 3:59 # "Tell Me the Truth" - 3:48 # "Sitting in a Bar" - 3:59 ==References== Category:1993 songs Category:Jimmy Barnes songs
title: Sweat It Out (Jimmy Barnes song)
